title: RESEARCH PROGRAM PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT
body:
This Agreement is entered into between {{institution.name}} ("Institution") and {{participant.full_name}} ("Participant") regarding participation in the {{program.title}} research program.

By signing this agreement, the Participant agrees to take part in the research program under the terms and conditions outlined below.

title: TRAINING PROGRAM PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT
body:
This Agreement is entered into between {{institution.name}} ("Institution") and {{participant.full_name}} ("Participant") regarding participation in the {{program.title}} training program.

The Institution agrees to provide training services and the Participant agrees to actively engage in the program activities as outlined herein.

title: INTERNSHIP PROGRAM AGREEMENT
body:
This Agreement is entered into between {{institution.name}} ("Host Organization") and {{participant.full_name}} ("Intern") regarding participation in the {{program.title}} internship program.

This internship is designed to provide practical work experience and professional development opportunities.

title: ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS
body:
To participate in this program, the Participant must:

a) Be at least {{min_age}} years of age
b) Meet the academic requirements: {{academic_requirements}}
c) Have completed prerequisite training: {{prerequisites}}
d) Maintain {{gpa_requirement}} GPA or equivalent
e) Provide proof of {{insurance_type}} insurance coverage
f) Pass background check requirements as applicable

title: PROGRAM DURATION AND SCHEDULE
PARTICIPANT RESPONSIBILITIES
body:
The Participant agrees to:

a) Attend all scheduled sessions and activities
b) Complete assigned tasks and assessments on time
c) Maintain professional conduct and respect for others
d) Follow all safety protocols and institutional policies
e) Maintain confidentiality of sensitive information
f) Provide feedback and evaluations as requested
g) Notify the Institution of any conflicts or issues promptly
h) Commit {{time_commitment}} hours per week to program activities

title: INSTITUTION RESPONSIBILITIES
body:
The Institution agrees to:

a) Provide qualified supervision and mentorship
b) Ensure a safe and supportive learning environment
c) Deliver program content as outlined in the curriculum
d) Provide necessary resources and materials
e) Maintain participant records confidentially
f) Offer {{support_services}} support services
g) Provide {{certification_type}} upon successful completion
h) Ensure equal opportunity and non-discrimination

title: ASSESSMENT AND EVALUATION
body:
Participant progress will be evaluated through:

a) Regular performance assessments
b) {{assessment_frequency}} formal evaluations
c) Completion of required projects and assignments
d) Peer and supervisor feedback
e) Self-reflection and portfolio development

Grading System: {{grading_system}}
Passing Grade: {{passing_grade}}

Participants must maintain satisfactory progress to continue in the program.

title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS
CONFIDENTIALITY AND NON-DISCLOSURE
body:
The Participant acknowledges that they may have access to confidential information including:

a) Research data and methodologies
b) Institutional proprietary information
c) Personal information of other participants
d) Commercial and business information

The Participant agrees to:
- Maintain strict confidentiality during and after the program
- Not disclose confidential information to third parties
- Use information solely for program purposes
- Return all materials upon program completion

This obligation continues for {{confidentiality_period}} after program completion.

title: STIPEND AND FINANCIAL ARRANGEMENTS
TERMINATION AND WITHDRAWAL
body:
This agreement may be terminated by:

a) Mutual consent of both parties
b) Completion of program requirements
c) Participant withdrawal with {{withdrawal_notice}} notice
d) Institution termination for cause including:
   - Violation of program policies
   - Unsatisfactory performance
   - Misconduct or breach of agreement

Upon termination:
- All materials must be returned
- Outstanding obligations must be fulfilled
- Final evaluations will be completed
- Pro-rated stipend adjustments may apply

title: DISPUTE RESOLUTION
